tests.title: correctly handles simple parameters
tests.fullTitle: C8QL queries c8ql correctly handles simple parameters
tests.code:
let values = [
    0,
    42,
    -1,
    null,
    undefined,
    true,
    false,
    "",
    "string",
    [1, 2, 3],
    { a: "b" }
];
let query = jsC8_1.c8ql `
        A ${values[0]} B ${values[1]} C ${values[2]} D ${values[3]} E ${values[4]} F ${values[5]}
        G ${values[6]} H ${values[7]} I ${values[8]} J ${values[9]} K ${values[10]} EOF
      `;
chai_1.expect(query.query).to.equal(`
        A @value0 B @value1 C @value2 D @value3 E @value4 F @value5
        G @value6 H @value7 I @value8 J @value9 K @value10 EOF
      `);
let bindVarNames = Object.keys(query.bindVars).sort((a, b) => (+a.substr(5) > +b.substr(5) ? 1 : -1));
chai_1.expect(bindVarNames).to.eql([
    "value0",
    "value1",
    "value2",
    "value3",
    "value4",
    "value5",
    "value6",
    "value7",
    "value8",
    "value9",
    "value10"
]);
chai_1.expect(bindVarNames.map(k => query.bindVars[k])).to.eql(values);

    .catch(done);
